scripts.build:wasm-mt: cross-env RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory' rustup run nightly-2021-02-11 wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-parallel -- --features parallel -Z build-std=panic_abort,std
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && webpack build ./index.js --mode production -o dist --output-filename index.js && cp index.html dist/
